description: The Intercooler 360 is a high efficiency, snap-on cooling device Xbox 360. It increases air flow and provides extended life and reliability. Using 3 fans, the Intercooler 360 reduces heat to promote better performance from your favorite gaming system. The compact, cooling device snaps onto the back of the console, fits in entertainment centers with the 360 in a horizontal or vertical position, and turns on and off automatically in conjunction with the 360.
